website_summaries.verdict: Absorbent enough for multiple uses by smaller dogs and puppies, though like most pads, aiming is everything.
pros: Very absorbent, handling multiple uses, owners report
No lingering smell after puppy uses a pad
Sized well for smaller dogs, puppies, and senior cats
cons: Reports of pads not sealed to the water-resistant backing
Pad can leak if dog doesn’t hit the center precisely

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye 4 paws.
customer_reviews.text: These have gone downhill. I cannot buy them anymore. The quality went from pure perfection 10 years ago to unacceptable the last few boxes. Gradually over the years, I was well aware of the deteriorating quality but I stayed hopeful. I'm done. My loyalty ends here, I cannot keep buying the same product I have always bought and telling myself that it is just a bad batch or that it's completely acceptable to put 3 wee wee pads down instead of 1 for a less than 10 pound dog with baby sized pp amounts. I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: BooBooKitty

customer_reviews.title: extremely poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the brand they used to be. For the same size pet, I used to get FOUR uses from this. Now, I get at most 2, sometimes only ONE!? If s/he went in the middle, it spread EVERYWHERE, so sometimes, ONE use for a 3-4 pound pet. NOT at all absorbent. Even worse, if s/he went near the edge (still on the white), it would leak out and onto the floor! This company spends more on FALSE ADVERTISING, then the quality of their product nowadays. Total TRASH. I switched to SIMPLE SOLUTIONS, and everyone was much happier, cleaner, and with more money saved.
customer_reviews.author: arisuferret

customer_reviews.title: so these are super handy. My dog uses them without any problems
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 6th-floor, city apartment building. I can't just let my dog out into a yard, so these are super handy. My dog uses them without any problems. I use a magnet to put one corner of the pad up against a wall which is in the corner of my bathroom. My dog never misses the middle of the pad. The pads never leak. They are very absorbent and easy to dispose of. They never smell. I have tried other pads that do leak. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: I bought the All-Absorb Training Pads because it had such great reviews and awesome price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: When I went to pick up my puppy, I bought a small pack of Wee-Wee pads with the grass print last minute. When I laid it out, he was drawn to it instantly and knew what it was for! Potty training success since Day 1! It absorbed the pee so well. After I used up the small pack, I bought the All-Absorb Training Pads because it had such great reviews and awesome price on Amazon. Unfortunately, I got what I paid for. The quality was more inferior and it certainly did not absorb as well. I went back to the Wee-Wee pads and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Evenstar728

customer_reviews.title: Best pads ever and I used them all......
customer_reviews.text: I had a Pomeranian that was never really trained properly that came along with my wife... We used all types of pads while I was training her but these pads are hands down the best pads. They are super absorbent, nothing runs out of them, no leak through, they are just perfect. The main issue I had with the cheaper pads is they would not soak up the pee quick enough and it would run off the pads. Trust me I have done the research and learned the hard way... these pads are the best and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Not So Great...
customer_reviews.text: We put these in the bathroom over floor rugs so our 1.5 year old dog can urinate without having to go outside during the middle of the night. Even when she pees in the middle of the pad, the liquid soaks through. If you lift the pad and look under the bathroom rug, there is clearly a circle of liquid on the back of the rug where it soaked through. I'll start trying to place 2 or 3 of these on the floor in hopes it will not soak through the rug. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Very thin. Water does not leak onto the floor but it does not absorb either. The water just sits on the pad like it sits on a floor tile. No absorption. After peeing when the dog walks back on the pad the feet gets wet as if the dog walked in a bucket of pee.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Good Pads For Emergencies and Training
customer_reviews.text: We need pads without having to leave the puppies alone in the home in non-stop destruction mode and Amazon delivered these, the smaller 7 per pack unit, same-day which was a lifesaver! The pads obsorb well and are good for training/emergencies, though, optimally you want to gradually train your pups to go outside. Number one reason people get rid of their puppies is because of potty cleaning. Figure out a solution now, or become an unfortunate statistic!
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Long-term customer; used to like this product, but not anymore
customer_reviews.text: I used to think these were great; they were affordable and they did the job well. But then the company changed the design and now they don’t work nearly as well. I wish companies would stop trying to fix things that aren’t broken. And the price of these has almost doubled in the last 9 months. What’s up with that? I think I’ll be finding an alternative to purchase elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality mats and liquid does not penetrate through
customer_reviews.text: We use these for my 14 year old dog who has decided he no longer likes grass and prefers to pee in the comfort of our home. These are good quality mats and liquid does not penetrate through. My pup sometimes misses and liquid overflows onto the floor, however this is not a product issue. We've very satisfied with this product. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Halestorm

customer_reviews.title: Better investment for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find good prices to buy in build locally in stores so I figured I'll try ordering from online. There's several products but this fits the size for my two small dogs. I have shitzu mixed with Maltese so they're pretty small. There's a lot in the box so I know it'll last me a long time. Shipped fast through prime. The only thing I'd recommend is to highly train your dogs to be accurate as mine seem to always want to pee on the corner of the pad. There's no leakage and the pad is better than other pads I've seen as they tear or rip up.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get what you order.
customer_reviews.text: I just reordered what I always order and was sent the standard size. I use the large. I have Five dogs and need the large. I do like the Four Paws but a heavy pee and it does go through to the floor. I just wish I wouldn’t have had t9 use any of these so 8 could return them. Also, they are smaller than the ones I get at Sams.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent Pee Pads 🐕
customer_reviews.text: These pee pads are better than most! They're strong, sturdy, absorbent, and WAY better than Amazon's pee pads. They're not particularly large, but they're effective. The moisture stays on and in the pad rather than leaking out of the sides like other pads. It works really well and is perfect for potty training or when you can't be there to take your pooch out. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: New item design-I do not approve
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product on my monthly subscriptions for years. I’ve always had chihuahuas and these peepads were literally the cream of the crop! Perfect size, immaculate absorbency, and leak proof. The box I just received is absolutely horrible. I’m not sure if they changed their design, but it’s almost as if they removed a layer of padding. If the next box is the same I will have to return the item and cancel my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: We've used these for years -- they work like they should
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog that's trained to go both outside and inside on a pad, since we sometimes can't get home until late. I don't have much to say about these other than they just work. If our dog pees on the white inner material, it will not leak. Even if she misses and hits the blue border, it often will not leak through, which says a lot, in my opinion. If she misses beyond that, well, there's not much any product could do...
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G

customer_reviews.title: The best pads to buy hands down!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pads to use for my pup. I’ve been using these pads for about 2 years now. I tried the GLAD brand once and instantly regretted it. These pads are absorbent and leak proof. It’s easy to see where my dog went on it because of its light color. It’s easy to pick up and there’s never a mess. My dog trained on these pads and now only uses them occasionally. One is always down in the house just in case. I will not be buying any other brand but this one. (My dog is about 47lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: Warning !! No good ! Cheaply made !
customer_reviews.text: the quality of these pads have gone way down. They need to quit selling this brand. For what they cost they should be the best, but are not. I have complained before hoping that they would be better the next time I ordered, but not. I'm getting in touch with the company WeeWee to let them know. They are very sorry ! Do your self a favor , save your money "DO NOT BUY THESE"
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: From 5 stars to 1 star.  HUGE CHANGE IN QUALITY.  So very disappointed in Four Paws!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Four Paw Wee Wee Pads for over 3 years and have not been disappointed until now. I am shocked at the difference in quality between the last box and the one we rec'd this week. Stitching lines/quilting boxes are much larger, less quality of stitching and padding. Padding is dispersed throughout the pad unevenly. Box says 25% more absorption, but I doubt this very much. You can see straight through spots where there is no padding - so this is not possible. Time to look for another source of wee wee pads!! Bye-bye Wee Wee Pad subscription!
customer_reviews.author: Suki O

customer_reviews.title: The Only Brand I Trust 🙂
customer_reviews.text: I have a Teacup Maltese puppy & I tried a less expensive brand before these, it wasn't worth it. These are SUPERIOR pads in every way. They have a thicker absorbent padding. I find that the urine doesn't pill on top of the pad as it has with others. It has a border which works to keep the urine from leaking/spilling off the pad if she potties close to the edge. They have little to no smell once soiled, I change them out after every soil. They are a nice larger size & are easy to unfold. I recommend this brand...Hope this helps someone 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Shann 🎀 Shann

customer_reviews.title: Quality has changed for the worse
customer_reviews.text: I bought these, according to my orders, 14 times. I noticed the last box I had that fold was different and something seemed off about them. I was too busy to care that much about it so I ordered again anyway and now I can't ignore it anymore. They added a plastic coating to the top later instead of the cottony feeling layer, my dog doesn't even want to go on it anymore. I can see how put off by it she is. I'll be switching to another brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These pads are thicker and more absorbent than other pads I have used in the past. I did not find them to leak at all, which is a common problem with many other training pads on the market. They do not appear to have any noticeable (human) scent to them. My only suggestion would be to add glue strips to the underneath so that they will stay in place. All in all, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Damien Hart

customer_reviews.title: Wee Wee Pads
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened from one shipment to the next, but the pads sure have changed. I buy the extra large and this size for my older dogs that cannot go outside at night. The quality of the pads has gone down and the price went up. I was on the subscribe and save and I had to stop it, I will try and find a better brand to use.
customer_reviews.author: jkblues

customer_reviews.title: Worse than drug store
customer_reviews.text: My puppy thinks these are just absolutely the most delicious pads in the entire world. And that's the only positive thing I can say about them. Pee leaked straight out the bottom and onto my hardwood floors, and MAN does it smell. It literally smells worse when she pees on these than when she just pees on the floor. I bought these based on a widespread review of different brands of training pads when I should have read the most recent reviews here, because clearly the quality has changed since that review. I'll be going back to my drug store pads until I find one that's actually better than those
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not the Same !
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these pads for years for my dog ~ I just opened the new pack of 200 counts, found disappointing. The quilted area is four-times larger than the previous one which is effecting the absorbency. ( photo; the left side shows the previous products and the right side shows the current one)
customer_reviews.author: OC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 200 count wee pads. First off, the color of the pads are a lighter blue than the previous package I received. There is an almost gritty feeling to the outside material. The absorbing white part itself looks and feels plastic almost. The box itself smelled of a vinegar odor. You were my go to for years. What happened Four Paws?
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice! I've tried other brands and they are junk to the point of not being usable. These are super nice and very (very) durable. Obviously you have to throw them out once they are wet, but they don't fall apart or slide all over.
customer_reviews.author: RoseGarden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pets & baby messes!
customer_reviews.text: Although it's initial use is for potty training, these are great to use when: (1) you place them under the grass for indoor use. It keeps you from having to continue to wash the pads that come with the potty grass. (2) changing baby's diapers. My 4 month old daughter isn't potty trained, so knowing when she's going to use the restroom is sometimes a mystery, so using a disposable wee-wee pad is perfect for at home & Disneyland! It catches all of her messes! + this box is cheaper than what you pay at the baby stores.
customer_reviews.author: Syl M.

customer_reviews.title: this being the better of the two
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two varieties for my puppy, this being the better of the two. My puppy is drawn to them, and though his aim isn’t the best, he knows to go to the pads. The only problem is he also loves to chew on them at times, so I have to watch him carefully. They are fairly absorbent, keeping all fluids from the floor. I have bought these several times and will continue to use them as my puppy (I hope) learns to outgrow them.
customer_reviews.author: E. H. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent.
customer_reviews.text: These work well as a lap pad for my husband when he does his tube feeding(formula nutrition), sitting in a chair. They are durable, absorbent and for what he needs to protect his clothing, this product is perfect. We do not-own a puppy however I imagine they would definitely serve the purpose needed to train the young ones. I recommend these pads as they can be used for many different needs.
customer_reviews.author: Barb T

customer_reviews.title: product has changed no longer good
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened I hope they contact me. It was wonderful but this new box they sent me does NOT absorb as well and the quilting pattern is different now and whew you can smell the urine strong now when the dogs use them. Something is wrong!!!
customer_reviews.author: HarleyKim

customer_reviews.title: I had doubts but this product proved itself wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to change up potty pad brands, the one I had wasn't bad, but this one is really good! My dog took to it instantly with great results, I love how it doesn't have the gel stuff, which gets everywhere and a disaster to clean. After using this product I feel like I won't go for any other potty pads! This is a great set of potty pads I'll be continuing to purchase. A little bit higher in the cost but well worth it in quality. A note on the side, consider have it shipped in amazon packaging... Other wise all your neighbors can see what you ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Pads and Best Value
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the different wee wee pads I’ve used over the years, Four Paws is the best. The price on Amazon is a much better value than at pet supply stores. Ships with Prime so I don’t have to schlep to the store, haul them in the trunk, then get the cumbersome box up the stairs. ❤️❤️ them!! (Who knew 10 years ago I would be gushing over wee wee pads on Amazon?)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: We have two small dogs who are pad trained due to harsh and long winters. The first thing I noticed about these pads was the price. Usually pads that are this affordable are extremely flimsy and have spots where the "filling" breaks apart inside leaving it thin or bare. They never leak through, and we actually purchased the pad frames on Amazon as well to ensure no leakage from the sides. We've been buying them for years now and the quality has remained the same. I do recommend these compared to other pads of the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: These pads are so tiny i have to use 6 just to get a square for a 9 week old puppy. They are not thick at all. Really wish I could return them but covid 19 make it impossible to do.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof is much much better!
customer_reviews.text: I admit I have been using this for a different purpose. So I'll just say, for the leak proof, it's awesome, no leaking whatsoever. But since it's a squirter, gotta be careful to make sure that the liquid got absorbed first or else, the bed got soaked as it has several time 😆 it's bigger than the last pads I had so I'm thankful and grateful that it's actually better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: They work great - but it's more convenient and a bit cheaper to buy the larger container of these - assuming you have paper trained your pup. I have a small dog, and she changed from being outside house trained to paper trained in about a week. It saves me taking her out in nasty weather. I'm handicapped, so that's a big plus for me. And since she's such a wee thing, she gets plenty of exercise just running around inside. The puppy pads are a godsend, very reliable to protect your floors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Winter

customer_reviews.title: THE PAD THAT DOES NOT LEAK THROUGH
customer_reviews.text: My dog recently became a diabetic and drank water like a camel and peed like a fire hose. Now the dog has the insulin for his diabetic condition, he [ 22 lbs small mutt ] still pees a lot. The wee pads do not leak through, if the dog pees in or near the center. If he pees really off center the urine will flow to the side and over.
customer_reviews.author: BERNARD J. HAGGERTY

customer_reviews.title: Strong Unpleasant Scent
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for a while and have been happy with them, but the latest package has a very strong scent. I cannot tolerate it. I don't know if Amazon will give me my money back, but I will never buy these again!!!! I have already ordered some others that say they are unscented since I can't use these.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Binoche

customer_reviews.title: Was better at one point of time
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using these pads they were awesome because I had try a lot of pads but always had problems with leaking. These held up but now I can see through them some times and it's not all of them it some of them. Like the machine didn't add the right amount of cotton.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: when the weather is bad, I point to the pad and tell him ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a small Shih Tzu / Bichon mix puppy that is potty trained to use puppy pads when the weather is too cold to go outside. He will ask to go out but, when the weather is bad, I point to the pad and tell him "potty on the pee pad" and he will. The only catch is, he will only use the Wee-Wee pads; no other! If I buy a different brand, he will chew them up, so I stick with the brand that works. You can't beat Four Paws products in my opinion and Amazon has them at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorJA

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase for me....
customer_reviews.text: My two rescue pups have been trained to use training pads when we are not home. The brand I usually purchase (elsewhere) were out of stock so I purchased these. It was a waste of money because my pups will not use them. Not sure why, but it's a no go for them. 9These pads are also smaller and are more expensive than the pads I usually purchase0.
customer_reviews.author: gammie june

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the real ones on your second subscription delivery
customer_reviews.text: First order was great!! The pads were super absorbent and resistant. The second time that the box arrived well I reviewed them in January just now opened the bag because I still had some from first purchase.. now the pads on the second box are like the ones you buy at Wal-Mart or HEB.. which I was running away from that quality because it’s a bad quality.. I’m so disappointed ... you can even see it in the color of the pads.. the one on the left is the good one while the one on the right is the cheap thin one. Not going to buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't prevent leakage
customer_reviews.text: These are pitiful. Giving them two stars because I have yet to find another puppy pad that was better than these, but I still have to use two or three at a time to prevent leakage. A large pack lasts no time because they are so thin, and they are pretty pricey compared to other brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: DrBailey

customer_reviews.title: They worked Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for puppy stage or for small indoor dog that is trained. We liked them so much but not as much as our rest in peace Pixie female Pug. She loved them so much she even found them cozy to lay at times.
customer_reviews.author: You Get The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Pads
customer_reviews.text: These pads are very thin and will soak through instantly. My 8 week old puppy would soak these with just a few drops. I would have to use three at a time to control the leaking. Although the price was great for the quantity, I would not recommend these to anyone at all. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: D, Burns

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy a RIP off
customer_reviews.text: They are not absorbant and you can see they are clear. I had the subscription because they were good a year ago and they sent me two boxes at once charging me double this sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Eskie-mom

customer_reviews.title: These pads are great. Just got a new puppy and he couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: These pads are great. Just got a new puppy and he couldn't go outside until he got his flu shot and rabies shot. He started peeing in different places, where there was no pad. The vet recommended I place the pads all over the house, which I did, and she said he would gravitate to his favorite place, which I think he has, for the most part. I find that if he goes about two times on a pad, he won't use that one again. So I have to keep up with replacing them promptly.
customer_reviews.author: PuppyLuv

customer_reviews.title: Have never leaked and have used longer than 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent potty training pads! Just have to make certain the plastic is placed on the bottom side. Both sides are white, but the absorbent side is imprinted as quilted. (Lesson learned the hard way! 😳🙄🥺 Oops!)
customer_reviews.author: MO Resident

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: I knew when I purchased these pads they would not be large enough. I was not willing to pay more. My dog weighs 50 lbs and is on steroids for severe allergies. They make her extremely thirsty. She is 11 years old and cannot hold it over night. I got tired of cleaning my antique rug so I thought I would try these. I was surprised that she knew the intended use was. No more carpet cleaning for me! It does not always hold all her urine but it keeps it from running all over. I keep my plastic gloves and a Swiffer mop right by her "pee" spot. This makes cleaning up effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Plug

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product, especially for my three pound Chihuahua. I keep one in a corner of my bathroom. He learned to use it almost immediately. It is really useful when it is stormy and rainy, and my dog rebels against going anywhere outside. I've been using this product for two or three years. Definitely worth 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Pads - Huge Package
customer_reviews.text: We got really surprised at how large this package was when we got it. Compared to brick and mortar stores, the amazon price was great. The pads work well, they absorb multiple toilet visits and don't hold too much smell. We used both on carpet and hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Sena Zorlu

customer_reviews.title: Products delivered should be wrapped so that no one knows what's inside
customer_reviews.text: pads had no wrapping around it to hide what was in the box. Anybody that needed them could have gone to my screen door and pick up the box and saw what that was that's never happened before. They should wrap it with some brown paper or something. My area isn't the best. I love the wee wee pads but not the way they were left at the door they left it inside the screen door which is great but anybody could see what they were because it wasn't wrapped up! Otherwise I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Dani Yelsaveta Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Thicker pads than what I have used before from Amazon .
customer_reviews.text: The pads I would normally get here on Amazon went way up in price and tho I liked them I was not paying what they wanted. So I searched until I decided to try these and I do not have any issues whatsoever with these THICK pads! They are thick to me compared to the previous ones I was using. Backing is leakproof for us so far and they hold plenty of liquid. They are packed nice in the box even! I honestly do not know yet if they gel up very fast or not yet tho...sorry. Anyway, I would not hesitate to try them if you are looking for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri D.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with these absorbent puppy pads!
customer_reviews.text: These little pads have pleasantly surprised me! I normally buy a very good thick brand from Kmart but lately they've been out so I had to search Amazon for a new brand but it wasn't looking promising. I've had very bad experiences with poor absorbency and leakage from the blue puppy pads so we were extremely skeptical of these. They have turned out to be very absorbent and we rarely have any accidents and if we do its usually because my chihuahua wasn't on the bad all of the way. I love that they come in such a huge box as I can tell these will last us for a while. I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: AmberHale

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These pads work just fine. Have been helpful to us with a little dog that was not trained well as a puppy. We have to keep her on a routine but sometimes she uses wee pad. They are very adequate for our use. Our dog weighs 8pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Patsyp

customer_reviews.title: BEST "Wee Wee" Pads I've Ever Used For My Furbabies!
customer_reviews.text: This are very high quality pee pads, or as they say "wee wee" pads, for dogs. I have two chihuahuas and even though they are house trained, these are perfect for days my fiance' and I work long hours. Not all pee pads are created equal. You need ones that are layered and quilted! Take my word on that. I've been using pee pads for years and these are the best I've used and at a price affordable enough that I will buy from them again. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Filmmaker

customer_reviews.title: No leaks here.
customer_reviews.text: These pads are much more absorbent than the ones I buy from two local stores. Ever since my oldest Chihuahua, Chiri, began to lose his eyesight, he refused to go through the doggy door to urinate outside. And even though we continue with his outdoor walks, sometimes, he simply cannot wait. I have not experienced any leaks. YiiPee on that. I replace each day, sometimes twice so my home doesn't smell like urine and because I don't want my dogs walking through urine tainted/soaked surfaces. I also place these in an area where Chiri has privacy. These pads are great, too, when we experience heavy downpours. Then, all three of my Chihuahuas will use.
customer_reviews.author: danaeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua is old and if I am not home to take her out every 2 hours she will pee somewhere in the house, luckily she uses these pads, (only these, I tried cheaper onea but she just peed on thr carpet) these are absorbant
customer_reviews.author: KAtTIE SIVLEY

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and useful
customer_reviews.text: I got these for about $33 bucks a box (150 count) and it's nearly half the price than if I were to buy them at the pet store. They keep in a lot of pee, just gotta be careful picking it up in case not all the urine is absorbed by the material. It'll hold the pee if you pick up all the corners, but if you just lift by one corner, you're gonna have an extra mess on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Borgnet-harris

customer_reviews.title: Terrible leaky product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Started off ok but serious decrease in quality. I wasted my time calling the company who makes these. This is what they asked me to do... PAY to ship it back to them. So their “quality control” dept could analyze. Yes, me pay for that. Oh, but she promised to compensate my out of pocket expense by sending me a new box! LOL So, I paid for a bad product, and they want me to pay out of pocket to send it back? FOUR PAWS... get your act together that is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: FLOOR SAVERS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: IF I AM GOING TO BE AWAY FROM THE HOUSE FOR A FEW HOURS, THESE WEE WEE PADS KEEP FROM HAVING ACCIDENTS ON MY HARD WOOD FLOORS; THE BOY DOGS ALSO HAVE THE BINDERS ON WITH A WOMANS HEAVY DUTY PAD . THIS GIVES COMPLETE PROTECTION WWITH NO WORRIES AND NO MESS WHEN I GET HOME. MY LIFE WOULD BE A BIT MORE HECTIC WITHOU THE PEEE PEE PADS
customer_reviews.author: Nicky's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good I use charcoal pad as backup together they are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Dog uses great however I use black charcoal pad under neath to keep total absorption and odorless and the floor free of pee & poo mini golden doodle. I get 2 uses per I rotate clockwise
customer_reviews.author: jayson pascucci

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know what happened...
customer_reviews.text: They used to be pretty sturdy and absorbent. Now every time my 6 pound chihuahua uses one of them, they are torn into tiny shreds that I then have to pick up. You can see a noticeable difference ever since they added this “new” “improved” text to the product. Whatever, new and improved my rear end. Whatever you changed to make them so flaky that a chihuahua can make them look like they went through an industrial strength shredder, you need to change back.
customer_reviews.author: RP Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute ****
customer_reviews.text: Took delivery of these tiny squares yesterday, does not keep urine on the pad at all....not at all.... will not bother returning them as they were cheap to begin with. I guess it really is true, you get what you pay for. Don’t waste your money on these they are NOT worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pads in the past and was happy with them. If you don't notice right away that your animal peed on it, it leaks right through the plastic backing. Not happy with this product because of the leaking so that's why I gave it only 1 star overall. It does absorb for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Seaz

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had discovered these sooner
customer_reviews.text: As a long-time cat owner, I'm thrilled to discover that these pads work with elderly cats who often can't make the box any longer, but do understand that the pads can be used instead of the floor. The cats figured it out much faster than I did. It greatly reduces stress for cats and humans alike and makes clean-up quick and easy. No more stinky, soiled rugs! The pads are also great for use in the carrier on trips to the vet. I stack a couple of pads inside and pull out the top one as it becomes soiled. They still don't like the vet so much, but the trip back and forth is more pleasant for all.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Wee Wee Pads...easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little more absorbent...but if I can change the pads as soon as my little chihuahuas pee on them, there is no leakage onto the tile...if I have to wait more than 8 hours before I change the pad, I have leakage and have to clean the area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old dog won't use them
customer_reviews.text: My old dog is losing her ability to hold it until she is outside. We got these and put the in strategic places, but she will go all around them but not on them. She will pee and poop on any rug she sees though. Tried putting these on a rug. No luck. I think if a puppy is trained on these pads they will work, but for a 15 year-old dog the old saying "you can't teach an old dog new tricks" applies here.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyne Natali

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in new version of product. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: These Four Paws Wee Wee pads are supposed to be a new improved version of the older Four Paws Wee Wee pads. They even have marked on box 25% more absorbent. Not true. The older version is much more absorbent. These are made very flimsy. I even weighed them, New version 1.25 oz and the older version 1.30 oz. prices have increased about 10.00 in the past year. Just another example of a manufacturer charging more and giving less. Been using product for about two years, and this new version is definitely a big step down in quality. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Arlene J Collins

customer_reviews.title: Saves My Carpets
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pads on the market, as far as I'm concerned. They do the job and are reasonably priced. I have used other brands and these are the most robust and absorbant. I have three dogs and two are elderly. The seniors can't go all night without heeding nature's call, so we have lots of these on the bathroom floor. The dogs bypass the rugs and the corners of the room to use the pads. 150 pads lasts me many months. They are great when it rains and my crew refuse to go outside. They also helped in a recent diagnosis of a UTI in one of my dogs because the "stain" was a different color than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Dollysmaid

customer_reviews.title: Puppy wee wee pads
customer_reviews.text: I just got a ten week old Pomeranian/ShihTzu puppy. Not really sure what I was thinking. I haven't raised a puppy since 1988. Since the weather has been very cold and snowy, I'm not able to take her outside as often as possible so I ordered these. I was very impressed when I opened th box today upon arrival. They are much thicker than the wee wee pads I got from SAMs. o noticed her immediately checking it out and, eventually, she did use it once. I hope she catches on soon. She does potty outside when the temps are high enough to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H.

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver for me...... & others with pets with health issues!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wee wee pads that I have bought. You get more buying from here and at a better price. I have bought these from a store but less of them for almost the same amount. These do not leak; so far they are the same size and they are not seconds. I read some reviews; and honestly I cannot remember if the reviews were about these; but I can assure you that you are getting first quality pads. I have a dog who has some severe health issues, these pads truly make my life easier! I will buy them again & again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the apartment dog!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy these for my dog. Even though he is over a year old now, and he is eliminates outside when I walk him, my dog is still an indoor dog. I live in an apartment, and he stays home alone the majority of the time when I am work. Although he waits until I get home, for him to go potty, I like the fact that he has the option to go in doors and not hold it more than he needs to. They actually hold most of the odor, and even if you don't have a pad holder, they hold pretty well. They aren't as thin as they look. They last a while too.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid De la Rosa

customer_reviews.title: weewee
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin and do not prevent "weewee" from wetting the floor. maybe if they only have to poop or tinkle a tiny bit it would work. They are good to help keep it from running across the floor as much and may be helpful with teaching a pup this is were I want you to go but don't expect it to keep your floor dry. I ordered dog litter pans and put them in it. I'm happy with that solution.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Small but good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at a good price during a prime sale. A Christmas present to the shelter where I volunteer. The pads were thick enough-look like a quality product. (Junky pads just don’t hold up.) These are small and didn’t realize it when I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Luckymommy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my crazy geriatric pooch!
customer_reviews.text: My crazy geriatric dog can’t hold it overnight like she used to. I spend more time carpet shampooing as she continues to age. I put these out, and she’ll find section of carpet to do the deed. These may work in a kennel - but my pooch is not attracted to the “attractants” in these pads. Next up doggie depends.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The lay down flat easier
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pads are good.very similar I like how these lay down. It might be a little thing but these lay down flat easier without wrinkling up.
customer_reviews.author: Cath

customer_reviews.title: Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for almost 6 years now. I have a small Maltese/ Yorkie mix. They absorb well and as long as she doesn’t miss her mark we have no problem. They are very absorbant.
customer_reviews.author: Nasilele

customer_reviews.title: We used these for training both our puppies
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We used these for both our puppies during the house-breaking process. It took about one and a half boxes for each of our puppies to get through the house-breaking period. I like how absorbent they are compared to using newspapers. My only caution is that if the puppy misses the pads and any liquid gets UNDER the pad, directly on your floor, step carefully, or you may slide and hydroplane across the room. Just watch for that and be careful because the bottom side is pure plastic and slippery when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter81

customer_reviews.title: I had another brand of training pads and these seem better quality in absorption and quality
customer_reviews.text: i used this wee wee pads for the puppy's crate, I do not leave them in the house because I do not want to confuse my puppy and let him know that it is ok to relieve himself within the house. I had another brand of training pads and these seem better quality in absorption and quality. Eventually I plan on leaving the wee wee pads in the kitchen when I have longer days at work but until the puppy is older and better housetrained only keeping the wee wee pads in the crate for when I am gone for a few hours
customer_reviews.author: fuzzwig24

customer_reviews.title: These are okay - but quality is hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing these pads for the past year - and quality seems to be different each time I get a new box. Very strange. Overall these are have been pretty good - only one box was of very poor quality. One box was excellent quality. The rest have been "Okay". They do the job - if the puppy goes on the pad! lol. I don't know that they have a "scent" on them to encourage dogs to do their business on the pad - if they do it doesn't seem to entice our pups.
customer_reviews.author: Lisae

customer_reviews.title: Great for guinea pig cage.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my guinea pig. She goes in one corner (well--now she does..we had some potty training issues but she has the idea now). I have her on fleece and cut those plastic shoe boxes to fit the corners. I cut the pads and clip them onto the corner units. It is SO easy. I change twice--sometimes 3x daily. If they need changing she'll chew on her cage bars to let me know. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: M. V. Kolar

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for the second time. It does the job. This time the box had been re-taped. I’m not sure if it was opened at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine LR

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6lb. Dachshund Puppy and I put down 2 pads side by side and these pads not only leak 100% of the time straight down to my wood floor but they are a HUGE mess to clean up because they DO NOT ABSORB AT ALL and when a I fold up the pads prior to throwing away, the Urine literally drips all the way to the trash can and this is NOT. A lot of urine and I change out the pads after each SINGLE USE!! HUGE WASTE OF MONEY!!! It’s really more like a SCAM!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Greenhalgh

customer_reviews.title: My dogs and I love these!
customer_reviews.text: It took my two small dogs a year to use this package and it made our life so much easier. I didn't have to rush back home before they had to go, and I didn't have to clear the floors when I didn't make it in time. These are very durable and can hold a LOT. I didn't have to train my dogs at all. They naturally started using them the moment I began to put them on the floor. I actually use them for tons of other things as well. They are great for wiping the bathroom floor for example after you step out of the shower. I highly recommend these to you!
customer_reviews.author: SpinningMarie

customer_reviews.title: These pads first off-- stick together like glue so I have to peel the individual pads ...
customer_reviews.text: Really not sure if these pads are the real thing or not. I've heard of many of the wee wee pads on Amazon being knockoffs and now I'm wondering if I'm a victim also. I've ordered the real Four Paw pads from a huge retailer and so I know the difference. These pads first off-- stick together like glue so I have to peel the individual pads open. Then, I could actually see some clumps of cotton in the filling which I don't remember ever seeing with the real thing. I also think I've seen some leakage which is also terrible. For now, these will have to do but I won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: These are not leakproof. When I clean these up, it's always wet underneath. It doesn't make sense to use more than one pad at a time, but I can see why others are using three at a time now...
customer_reviews.author: D. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best puppy pads out there!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't look any where else, these are these Best puppy pad on the market for your price.. I am an animal lover, and always have puppy's training in our home, A++ my pups smell n go right away, several times a day nothing goes thur these, they are very absorbent.. love these and will only buy these from now on, i am currently on my 3rd package..
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wink

customer_reviews.title: best absorbance overall
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, these are the best pads on the markets. Absorbance is terrific and pee doesn't bleed out like on most pads, the gel instantly keeps the pee spot limited, poop doesn't stick to the pad but comes off nicely. No leaks. I bought the originals 6 layer and the odor control is very good on those too. Just wish they would put them on sale more often.. My biggest regret is not buying more on amazon when the pads were on sale for Black Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but leaks
customer_reviews.text: More pee on floor under than on/in pad. Do not buy these. Can not even hold pee one time of 4 lb silkie or 14 lb dachshund female.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Irby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and one of the best pee pee pads ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price and one of the best pee pee pads I've used! I reorder this every 2 months or so. The more expensive ones from the store are not as good as these!
customer_reviews.author: JLSF

customer_reviews.title: What changed? Why are these now thin and cheap quality?
customer_reviews.text: This last box of wee wee pads is completely different from the previous ones. These pee pads are thin and cheap feeling. They are not the same thickness at all. I’m very diassapointed. I didn’t mind paying more for wee wee pads over the Costco ones because of the thickness and quality. But now that these are just as thin as Costco I might as well get the cheaper ones. Bring back the quality wee wee pads.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M. Nakashima

customer_reviews.title: It does the job but...
customer_reviews.text: the leak proof... mmm... when I pick up the dirty diaper, its always slightly wet the tray so clearly let liquid go thru. but no big deal since the tray is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: chronicles of Leonidas

customer_reviews.title: No longer the quality it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say I love this product, but unfortunately it used to be much better quality.. the plastic backing was much thicker and the padding more absorbant. But, several months ago it seemed the company may have been looking to cut their costs (translation: increase their profit), so the pads now don't absorb much and often seem to seep right through the plastic. Haven't yet found a reasonable substitute... ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazinggrace0711

customer_reviews.title: You can teach a dog new tricks!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value! We saved a lot of money buying these right here in AMAZON. And my two Chihuahuas actually use them without even training them on them at all. They are 4 1/2 years old and when we left town for a week a few weeks ago we left some down where they would normally go if they had an accident and couldn't hold it that long and that's where they would go when the Pet Sitter wasn't here. Very pleased with these!
customer_reviews.author: LISA LOUTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very good pads with good absorbency. I use them when changing my infant’s diaper as she sometimes pees before I get a chance to put her diaper on. I also use them when she throws up. Saved me the headache of having to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H

customer_reviews.title: Pee Pad Plus
customer_reviews.text: These do the job I got them for. I have cats and a dog and the older cats might wait too long so the get to the pee pad and my dog uses it if I don’t take her long enough at nite. The size is great and absorb well
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, best price on amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good deal/price for 150 pads. I usually get mine at a retail store that may or may not have them in stock, but at a decent price. This is the only time I've ever found another retailer selling them at a comparable price. The quality of the pads are good- if your dog pees on it in the morning, you'll still be leakage safe by night time, just in case you're not around to change them. You can always double them up too, if you know you'll be gone for a while. Compared to the many brands I've purchased, this one definitely stands out as a competing brand with great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen G.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what I speant
customer_reviews.text: Dont work as well as they should not very happy for the amount of money I speant on theese regreat it big time
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Wish I didn't have to use these...but my 4lb. Yorkie is 15 1/2 years old and is getting dementia. So she will sometimes just pee whenever she's near the door -- but not quite outside. Poor thing. But she's still spunky. So we do what we can because we love our fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Janae

product_meta.title: Four Paws Wee-Wee Puppy Training Standard Size 22" x 23" Pee Pads for Dogs
product_meta.description: Size:Standard 22" x 23"| Style:150-CountFour Paws has been providing the finest-quality products that simplify pet parenting and keep fur friends happy, healthy, and clean for more than 40 years. From the creators of America's Original Trusted Pads, Wee-Wee Superior Performance Pads are 25 percent more absorbent than original 5-layer Wee-Wee Pads. These dog potty training pads are designed with the Floor Armor Leak-Proof System, featuring 6 innovative layers for unparalleled floor protection. With a tear-resistant top layer, absorbent polymer that turns liquid into gel, and a leak-proof bottom layer to keep floors dry, just one pad offers 24 hour protection—guaranteed. All Wee-Wee dog pee pads also include targeted attractant to draw your dog to the pad and prevent potty training accidents elsewhere. Whether you need puppy training pads or simply a comfortable indoor potty spot for your best friend, each dog pad measures 22 inches x 23 inches and is ideal for fur friends of all sizes.
feature_bullets: Wee-wee pads are more absorbent than ever with a 6-layer floor Armor leak-proof system
Oversized quilted pockets on dog pee pads allow for maximum absorption
Pee pads contain wet-lock gel that quickly traps urine
22" X 23" Dog pads intended for canines of all sizes
Dog training pads to work or your money back
Note : “packaging may vary” for the product.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
